dt: {bc}a style or manner of arranging the hair

dt.t: I love his eerily perfect {wi}coiffure{/wi} and his … impish smile …

et: borrowed from French, going back to Middle French, "head covering, adornment of the hair," from {it}coiffer{/it} "to cover with a coif, arrange (hair)" (going back to Old French {it}coiffer, coifer{/it}, derivative of {it}coife{/it} {et_link|coif:1|coif:1}) + {it}-ure{/it} {et_link|-ure|-ure}
shortdef: a style or manner of arranging the hair
